thread.title: BRIEF-Quorum Says ‍Received Notice From Community Health Systems It Was Seeking To Terminate Some Agreements

title: BRIEF-Quorum Says ‍Received Notice From Community Health Systems It Was Seeking To Terminate Some Agreements
text: March 20, 2018 / 4:04 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Quorum Says ‍Received Notice From Community Health Systems It Was Seeking To Terminate Some Agreements Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Quorum Health Corp: * QUORUM - ‍RECEIVED NOTICE FROM COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS IT WAS SEEKING TO TERMINATE, EFFECTIVE SEPT 30, A SHARED SERVICES TRANSITION SERVICES AGREEMENT​ * QUORUM HEALTH CORP SAYS ‍SEEKING TO TERMINATE DEAL AS A RESULT OF ALLEGED BREACHES BY COMPANY OF SSC TSA AND IT TSA -SEC FILING​ * QUORUM HEALTH - ‍ CHS SEEKING TO TERMINATE AGREEMENT, DATED APRIL 29, 2016 BY AND BETWEEN REVENUE CYCLE SERVICE CENTER & QHCCS * QUORUM HEALTH CORP - ‍NOTICE FROM CHS PROVIDES OPTION TO DISCUSS TERMINATING RECEIVABLES COLLECTION AGREEMENT, ELIGIBILITY SCREENING SERVICES AGREEMENT * QUORUM HEALTH -‍CHS ALSO SEEKING TO TERMINATE COMPUTER AND DATA PROCESSING TRANSITION SERVICES AGREEMENT DATED APRIL 29, 2016 , BETWEEN CHSPSC & QHCCS​ ‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2u0WpKw ) Further company coverage:
